definition: dead loan/bad debts/to refuse to pay loan
render an account/submit an expense account/apply for reimbursement
to verify accounting records/also written 對賬|对账[dui4 zhang4]

sentences.english: To enhance the correctness of curtain, card, material and warrant.
sentences.chinese: 提高库存料件的帐，卡，物和单证输入的准确率。

sentences.english: Mark couldn't pay his bill, so he asked the owner to put it on the cuff.
sentences.chinese: 马克付不起帐了，就向店主赊账。

sentences.english: The rolling plains and the wild flowers, the boxing ring and a few old scores to settle.
sentences.chinese: 起伏的平原和野花，拳赛场地和要解决的旧帐。

sentences.english: Farther ahead there were lanterns and candles alight while Zhang Fei drank in his tent.
sentences.chinese: 遥望张飞大明灯烛，正在帐中饮酒。

sentences.english: If any debt becomes overdue, inform the branch head immediately.
sentences.chinese: 如遇应收账款逾期未到帐，立即告知知分公司总经理。

sentences.english: General Ledger business unit supports one base currency per ledger.
sentences.chinese: “总帐”业务单支持帐与本位币一对一的关系。

sentences.english: Jason prepares all his accounts using a microcomputer but I do mine with common or garden pencil and paper.
sentences.chinese: 贾森用微型计算机做帐，但我只用普通的纸和笔做帐。

sentences.english: Jason prepares all his accounts using a microcomputer but I do mine with common or garden pencil and paper.
sentences.chinese: 贾森用微型计算机做帐，但我只用普通的纸和笔做帐。

sentences.english: It's 120 yuan . Would you like to pay in cash or bill it to your room?
sentences.chinese: 一共是120元。请问怎样付款，付现金还是入房帐？

sentences.english: He tussled all night with the figures, but couldn't balance the account.
sentences.chinese: 他绞尽脑汁算了一夜也没把帐算清。
春走，我们和他们算帐去。

sentences.english: After paying the bill, he braved the snow storm and started trekking north, carrying Violet in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 结算了店帐，抱着阿紫，冲风冒雪的向北行走。

sentences.english: Charge to your room or by cash?
I'm at my wits end worrying about how to pay the bill.
sentences.chinese: 我真没了主意，不知如何才能付清这笔帐。

sentences.english: Drapes that hang at the edge of the ceiling and end at the floor also emphasize this effect.
sentences.chinese: 在天花板外沿和地板之间挂上帐帘，也有同样的效果。

sentences.english: You can chalk the drinks up to my account.
sentences.chinese: 你可以把酒钱记到我的帐上。

definition: to verify accounting records/also written 對賬|对账[dui4 zhang4]
an accounts office (in former times)/an accountant/a cashier
(accounting) to balance the books/to do the accounts/(fig.) to settle an account/to get one's revenge
main hall of a Buddhist temple
